turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me an order from Starbucks set to pick up on my way home?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Which location were you thinking?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on S. Dobson would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They have that white and black drink for the season. Can you find that one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you mean the Black and White Mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.. Fancy hot chocolate.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti, please. And can I substitute heavy cream for milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check the options for you. It looks like I can change it to Coconut, Almond, Soy, or Whole milk.. no cream on the list.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I'll go with whole milk then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What? Oh.. no, not at all. extra whip cream please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Added. Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat that for a second venti, and one grande?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want three drinks total?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, three total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. Two venti and one grande Black and White Mochas, with whole milk and extra whip cream. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is. When will those be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order is placed, and will be ready for pick up in 15 minutes at the Starbucks on South Dobson. I'll send the receipt to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent! My kids thank you for the surprise treat!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ah.. I hope you and they enjoy the drinks!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye.
